price: Sizin məbudunuz yalnız Özündən başqa heç bir (haqq) məbud olmayan Allahdır. O, elm ilə hər şeyi əhatə etmişdir”.
arabic: إِنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عِلۡمٗا

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innamā ilāhukumu al-lahu alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa wasiʿa kulla shayin ʿil'man
